scripts.build: rm -rf lib && echo '{"version"': '"'$(npm --no-git-tag-version version minor)'"}' > src/version.json && tsc
scripts.buildw: rimraf lib && (for /f "delims=" %A in ('npm --no-git-tag-version version minor') do @echo {"version":"%A"}) > src/version.json && tsc
scripts.serve: npm run build && npx firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.servew: npm run buildw && npx firebase emulators:start --only functions
